data.title: Added A.I. that isn't totally useless.
Cheat Active -> Instant Build -> Nuke flash bug
data.body: We have startet a cheat game, with instant build active, with this options need the nuke onky 1 second, when i now fire 10 nukes to my friend, the screen goes white and will never change back to normal map (he can still see his build menu but the map is always white (from the nuke flash). for this i havent a exception

data.title: Game crashs sometimes (online multiplayer) -> Out of sync in frame 2745.
data.body:
After playing a while, the game closed it self (mac osx) the exception log say this

System.InvalidOperationException: Out of sync in frame 2745.

  at OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.OutOfSync (Int32 frame) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.CheckSync (System.Byte[] packet) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.OrderManager+<TickImmediate>c__AnonStorey12.<>m__4 (Int32 clientId, System.Byte[] packet) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.ReplayRecorderConnection+<Receive>c__AnonStorey1A.<>m__17 (Int32 client, System.Byte[] data) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.EchoConnection.Receive (System.Action`2 packetFn) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.ReplayRecorderConnection.Receive (System.Action`2 packetFn) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.TickImmediate () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game+<Tick>c__AnonStorey39.<>m__95 () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Sync+<CheckSyncUnchanged>c__AnonStorey30.<>m__65 () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged[Boolean](OpenRA.World world, System.Func`1 fn) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged (OpenRA.World world, System.Action fn) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Tick (OpenRA.Network.OrderManager orderManager) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Tick (OpenRA.Network.OrderManager orderManager, OpenRA.Graphics.Viewport viewPort) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Run () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Run (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Main (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

data.title: Putting infantry in the civilian church should give a "high point" sight bonus
data.body: Might need to do some work to allow garrisoning of (some) neutral buildings.

data.title: Editor: allow setting player colors
data.body:
Currently you have to hack the yaml, and figure out the proper numbers to put in the ColorRamp. Easiest way to do this currently is to choose the color you want in the lobby, quit, and copy the numbers from ~/.openra/settings.yaml. This is kindof stupid.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/98309-editor-allow-setting-player-colors?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Add in-game chooser for renderer
Make Widget.Get<T>() throw on missing by default
data.body:
This allows us to give a better error message than taking an NRE later.

If the widget is optional, we should have a .GetOrDefault<T>() which retains the current behavior.

data.title: Making build icon green on snow maps
data.body: Just a small request... I suggest to make the building icon which shows you where you can build green on snow maps only. As it can be sometimes hard to see where you actually build something while both backgrounds (the build icon and the snow temperate) are white.

data.title: Editor: Add copy/paste of rectangular regions
data.body: Blarget wants this

data.title: Make AI behavior more varied (code)
data.body:
Instead of checking for SquadSize dudes hanging around the base every 20 ticks and attacking if SquadSize dudes are present, throw a bit of randomness into the mix (but have the size of AI attack forces still trend towards SquadSize, which is 10 for HardAI). The idea is that sometimes, the bot should attack sooner and with fewer dudes (so it feels like the opponent "decided" to rush) and sometimes save up more, and once in a great while save up a whole bunch (so it feels like the opponent "decided" to turtle) and then attack.

sample implementation: https://github.com/earthpig/OpenRA-ep/commit/b8c834b69c4019150be3062739a69a3f7bd38410

On line 284: lowering that from 300 to, say, 250 or 200, will make the bot more likely to attack at around SquadSize units. Having it higher, say at 500, will make it more likely to save up way more. 300 was an arbitrary pick.

On lines 282 and 323: This is the minimum possible attack force. Lowering this will cause the attack sizes to trend more towards SquadSize. 3 was an arbitrary pick.

Playing 1v4 HardAI bots with the above HackyAI.cs, and recording how many units were in each bot's first attack force (recall that SquadSize is 10 for HardAI):
Game 1: 7, 10, 13, 17
Game 2: 11, 14, 16, 20
Game 3: 9, 14, 15, 15

(In light of that sample of 3 games, perhaps use 200 instead of 300)

data.title: C&C mod openra causing crash
data.body:
Hello my Red Alert runs on the latest patch 3.03 and openra itself runs perfect with it. But whenever I try to start the c&c mod in game openra kicks me back to desktop. I'm using the latest version of openra. (20120315, 2.8 MB)

And that's what the exception.log has to say about this:

System.InvalidOperationException: mods/cnc/sequences/structures.yaml:40: Sequence proc.idle uses frames [0..5] of SHP `proc`, but only 0..1 actually exist
   bei OpenRA.Graphics.Sequence..ctor(String unit, String name, MiniYaml info)
   bei OpenRA.Graphics.SequenceProvider.<LoadSequencesForUnit>c__AnonStorey64.<>m__138(KeyValuePair`2 x)
   bei System.Linq.Enumerable.ToDictionary[TSource,TKey,TElement](IEnumerable`1 source, Func`2 keySelector, Func`2 elementSelector, IEqualityComparer`1 comparer)
   bei System.Linq.Enumerable.ToDictionary[TSource,TKey,TElement](IEnumerable`1 source, Func`2 keySelector, Func`2 elementSelector)
   bei OpenRA.Graphics.SequenceProvider.LoadSequencesForUnit(String unit, MiniYaml sequences)
   bei OpenRA.Graphics.SequenceProvider.Initialize(String[] sequenceFiles, List`1 sequenceNodes)
   bei OpenRA.ModData.PrepareMap(String uid)
   bei OpenRA.Game.StartGame(String mapUID, Boolean isShellmap)
   bei OpenRA.Game.LoadShellMap()
   bei OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.CncLoadScreen.TestAndContinue()
   bei OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.CncLoadScreen.StartGame()
   bei OpenRA.Game.InitializeWithMods(String[] mods)
   bei OpenRA.Game.Initialize(Arguments args)
   bei OpenRA.Program.Run(String[] args)
   bei OpenRA.Program.Main(String[] args)

No clue what's causing it. I even installed openra in my original c&c95 folder (nyerguds version 1.6 rev3) to see if that works. I've also copied all c&c mix. files in my mod folder in my documents for openra to see if that works. None of the 2 test variations worked though. It's just freezing and then crashing with a typical windows message that the application has stopped working. Win Vista 64bit.

data.title: Add support for disabling sound
data.body: In server-only cases etc we don't want to have to sort out OpenAL support. We should have a config item to prevent us from even trying to initialize the sound system

data.title: Use crate with shadow when on the ground
data.body: Similar to our handling of crates in water. The parachute state ends up never being used for a landed crate.

data.title: Unify PowerBarWidget and SiloBarWidget
data.body: Data binding needs to be lifted out into the ui logic class.

data.title: Support targetlines for defenses
Support attackmove for aircraft
data.body: From [Arcturus] on irc

data.title: Obelisk firing in CNC screws up health bars for units
data.body: When an obelisk fires, it changes the rendering of unit health bars to just be solid flat bars

data.title: Tanya crushed by airfield
data.body:
It seems possible for Tanya to be crushed by the building she is C4-ing. In one game I set out my Tanya to C4 an airfield. She walked to the right bottom square of the airfield, and then suddenly died, as if she was crushed by the airfield.

Replay & screenshot uploaded here: http://tvollebregt.nl/temp/openra-issue-2033.zip

data.title: Feature request: In-game-map-downloads
data.body:
To give map creators the ability to quickly test fresh maps and to enable game hosts to quickly add new maps I want a feature to download OpenRA-Maps directly from inside the game-lobby.
These maps might be hosted on the content website http://content.open-ra.org and on that website there could be features like flagging malicious map files etc.

data.title: All players dropped from room pre-game
data.body:
While hosting a game last night I experienced something that have happened a few times before. It was a room with 10 players. Suddenly everyone in the room except for me dropped out instantly and at the same time. The exception.log-file says:

System.IO.EndOfStreamException: Kan ikke lese forbi slutten av dataflyten.
   ved System.IO.__Error.EndOfFile()
   ved System.IO.BinaryReader.ReadString()
   ved OpenRA.Order.Deserialize(World world, BinaryReader r)
   ved OpenRA.Network.OrderIO.ToOrderList(Byte[] bytes, World world)
   ved OpenRA.Network.ReplayRecorderConnection.IsGameStart(Byte[] data)
   ved OpenRA.Network.ReplayRecorderConnection.<Receive>c__AnonStorey1A.<>m__17(Int32 client, Byte[] data)
   ved OpenRA.Network.EchoConnection.Receive(Action`2 packetFn)
   ved OpenRA.Network.ReplayRecorderConnection.Receive(Action`2 packetFn)
   ved OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.TickImmediate()
   ved OpenRA.Game.<Tick>c__AnonStorey39.<>m__95()
   ved OpenRA.Sync.<CheckSyncUnchanged>c__AnonStorey30.<>m__65()
   ved OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged[T](World world, Func`1 fn)
   ved OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged(World world, Action fn)
   ved OpenRA.Game.Tick(OrderManager orderManager)
   ved OpenRA.Game.Tick(OrderManager orderManager, Viewport viewPort)
   ved OpenRA.Game.Run()
   ved OpenRA.Program.Run(String[] args)
   ved OpenRA.Program.Main(String[] args)

"Kan ikke lese forbi slutten av dataflyten" means "Can not read past the end of the data flow"
